verses.verse: וְהָ֣אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> ve-Ha-'a-Dam, And Adam יָדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da' had אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חַוָּ֣ה <S%H2332><s%> chav-Vah Eve אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To; his wife וַתַּ֙הַר֙ <S%H2029><s%> vat-Ta-har and she conceived וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> vat-Te-led and gave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קַ֔יִן <S%H7014><s%> Ka-yin, Cain וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer and said קָנִ֥יתִי <S%H7069><s%> ka-Ni-ti I have gotten אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish a man אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- from יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

He
